page.title: 17Population
page.content: In Frisby there are thirteen roads or streets on which people live.The total population is approximately 594, of whom 47% live on just three roads,Hall Orchard Lane, Great Lane and Main Street. In the part of Kirby which came in our area,the population is approximately 203,most of whom live on Main Street. There is a good cross-section of age groups and social classes,but a very low proportion of non-Europeans. In Frisby there is a mixture of old and newer dwellings,bungalows but no flats Kirby Bellars has more bungalows and a large house, Kirby Hall which is converted into flats. The majority of the working population travel daily to Melton,Leicester, Nottingham or Grantham.
